review_text: I was hoping these cups would a little taller but they are perfect for my son so we are still very happy with them. I am still on the hunt for taller cups in these colors since I purchased the bowls and plates that match. Those are also a bit smaller than expected and work great for my son but they also do well for the adults.
product_name: Ikea Kalas 101.929.56 BPA-Free Tumbler, Assorted Colors, 6-Pack, Set of 2
